item.title: Motivation system for my kids
item.description: Motivation system for my kids [[ABOUT/Roles/Father]] It is in constant development so it might change over time. What I tried Schedules - created a weekly schedules on which kids could track their progress and show me how they did.

item.title: What mistakes I made on the crypto market in 2021-2022
item.description: What mistakes I made on the crypto market in 2021-2022 What mistakes I took Didn’t take profit Didn’t make own research Didn’t listen to Phil Konieczny - he said that we should get back to bitcoin, if I had done what he said I would save a lot from the losses I took Trusted in Luna Getting into Polkadot parachains - it was too late Getting into project I didn’t fully understand What worked Following influencers - getting into the projects, they talked about, early Diversification - it was good that I kept my assets in few places I moved some BTC to ledger
